text: Mystery Skulls is the first EP by American indie pop/electronica band Mystery Skulls. It was produced by Luis Dubuc, the lead singer/songwriter of the group. It was released on December 28, 2011. ==Critical reception== Groove loves melody gave a positive review of the album: "Mystery Skulls, is bringing an infectious synth/dance EP. The sound is a slightly funkier Scissor Sisters with a hat tip to the musicality of San Serac and remembering Prince's falsetto." title: Mystery Skulls (EP)
